message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you first as I believe you would find great value in it.  I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $13,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm hoping we can meet closer to my original price. Would you consider $13,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I am unable to go above $13,500 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
